text: Gerald Sternberg (born March 18, 1943) was a Canadian football player who played for the Montreal Alouettes, Toronto Argonauts and Hamilton Tiger-Cats. He won the Grey Cup with Hamilton in 1972. He played college football at the University of Toronto.http://www.justsportsstats.com/footballstatsindex.php?player_id=sternger001http://www.varsityblues.ca/hof.aspx?hof=126&path;=&kiosk;= ==References== Category:1943 births Category:Living people Category:Canadian football defensive backs Category:Grey Cup champions Category:Hamilton Tiger- Cats players Category:Montreal Alouettes players Category:Soviet emigrants to Canada Category:Toronto Argonauts players Category:Toronto Varsity Blues football players
title: Gerry Sternberg
